title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Advanced Presentation Speaking Skills Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A microlearning course conducted in smartphone-based environments for pre-service and in-service elementary school teachers, emphasizing the improvement of presentation skills using mathematics education content.

learning_goals: Learners can produce and share a 3-minute video presentation explaining mathematical concepts using smartphone apps.
Learners can analyze their presentation skills through peer assessment and establish improvement plans.
Learners can create self-directed learning plans to practice mathematics education-related presentations at least once a week.

resources: Adobe Spark Video or similar apps
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
